provenance.label: Zhang v DBS Trust Company (Jersey) Ltd [2019] JRC 037
provenance.excerpt: A trustee who prefers their own interests above those of the beneficiaries breaches their fiduciary duty.

provenance.label: Trusts (Jersey) Law 1984, Art. 21
provenance.excerpt: A trustee shall, in the execution of their duties and in the exercise of their powers and discretions, act with due diligence and as would a prudent person.

provenance.label: JFSC Code of Practice for Trust Company Business, 6.4.14
provenance.excerpt: A trustee must notify the Commission if involved in litigation in any court.
